title: United States - lasting of love in a relationship in 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Share of respondents has stayed the same over the Year.

Share of respondents is roughly constant from 11_to_20_years to 6_to_10_years, gradually increasing from 6_to_10_years to A_lifetime, and lastly roughly constant from A_lifetime to Less_than_two_years.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 77.0 was reached at Year A_lifetime
Minimum Share of respondents about 2.0 was reached at Year 11_to_20_years, and Less_than_two_years

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Share of respondents has constant over the Year.

Share of respondents is roughly constant from 11_to_20_years to 6_to_10_years, gradually increasing from 6_to_10_years to A_lifetime, and lastly roughly constant from A_lifetime to Less_than_two_years.

The line significantly remained stable by 4.0 from Year 11_to_20_years to 2_to_5_years,increased by 74.0 from Year 6_to_10_years to A_lifetime, and lastly, remained stable by 75.0 from Year A_lifetime to Less_than_two_years.
